name: The Manor (Emmacassie)
description:
'It seemed to have always been there. Sat atop a hill overlooking the marshlands, the old Manor House stood, once grand, surrounded by meticulously kept gardens. Now most of the lower windows had been boarded up, the house left damp and decaying, the iron gates rusting around its perimeter.'

When Harold, the groundskeeper, awakes in the early hours of the morning to see a light coming from one of the upstairs windows of the abandoned manor house, he goes to investigate...
